name: Clank Clank You're Dead
description:
Collect Materials, Avoid Robots, Build the Bridge, Escape the Planet.

This was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Every second you spend out collecting material, you risk the odds being against you and getting attacked!

Use WASD to move, and press Q and click to build robots. Use robots to collect material to build more robots or your bridge. The longer you stay out the faster the robots will produce material. But be careful, the longer you stay out the higher the chance the robots will randomly attack you.
